item.title: Deploying package documentation with pkgdown and Travis CI
item.description: For my rEDM package, Iâ€™ve been using the pkgdown package to build a website comprising all the documentation and vignettes, for easy reference from a web browser. The normal workflow for this is something like: Make updates to the package. Run pkgdown::build_site() to generate the website files into a docs folder. Commit changes and upload to GitHub. Use GitHub Pages, configured to source the files from the docs folder on the master branch.
